com.bumptech.glide.presenter.target
Class ViewTarget<T extends android.view.View>

java.lang.Object
  com.bumptech.glide.presenter.target.ViewTarget<T>
Type Parameters:
T - The specific subclass of view wrapped by this target.
All Implemented Interfaces:
Target
Direct Known Subclasses:
ImageViewTarget
public abstract class ViewTarget<T extends android.view.View>
extends java.lang.Object
implements Target

A base Target for loading Bitmaps into Views that provides default implementations for most most methods and can determine the size of views using a ViewTreeObserver.OnGlobalLayoutListener.

To detect View reuse in ListView or any ViewGroup that reuses views, this class uses the View.setTag(Object) method to store some metadata so that if a view is reused, any previous loads or resources from previous loads can be cancelled or reused.

Any calls to View.setTag(Object)} on a View given to this class will result in excessive allocations and and/or IllegalArgumentExceptions. If you must call View.setTag(Object) on a view, consider using BaseTarget or SimpleTarget instead.
